actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that any worker with twenty-five years of service or more shall have a current connection for certain purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that any worker with 25 or more years of railroad service shall have a "current connection" status for purposes of benefit eligibility (whether or not such individual works for a nonrailroad employer after leaving railroad employment).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that any worker with twenty-five years of service or more shall have a current connection for certain purposes.
